name: The Black Knight
description: Black knight is a short (10 minutes to complete) arcade line defence game. Tons of monsters are trying to escape from an ancient crypt and only you can stop them. The main hero can move between three lines and cast spells to destroy the enemies. You need to defeat 10 waves of monsters to win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 70 MB available space
